
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18745981" title="发布于 2025-03-02 12:13">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">分享4款.NET开源、免费、实用的商城系统</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享4款.NET开源、免费、实用的商城系统，希望可以帮助到有商城系统开发需求的同学。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>nopCommerce<span><br></span></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span><span>nopCommerce是一个.NET开源功能丰富、免费、灵活且可定制的开源电子商务解决方案(大家假如有商城需求可以直接使用该项目进行二次开发，省时省力) ，具备商城该有的各种功能和特性。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目源码地址：<a href="https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce</a></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247490121&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=491e788a03f4db3fd7831366a1d245b5&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/GMCIYwGUr4JkraeWIG-F0Q</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121051717-802749735.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121103766-376127410.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>CoreShop<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>CoreShop完整开源、无封装无加密、商用免费、支持跨平台、多数据库支持，基于 Asp.Net 8.0、Uni-App开发、支持可视化布局的商城系统；前后端分离，支持跨平台运行；拥有分销、代理、团购秒杀、接龙、拼团、直播、优惠券、自定义表单等众多营销功能；支持一键发布到微信小程序、H5、安卓APP、苹果APP。</span></p>
<ul>
<li>项目源码地址：<a href="https://github.com/CoreUnion/CoreShop" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/CoreUnion/CoreShop</a></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247493310&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=9faaf85f599c3c087e8ae1b261e07f68&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/iRxmWUXrqArZD_Ax4i6wwg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121131678-868386622.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121138043-378570392.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>eShop<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>eShop基于.NET 9构建，并集成了.NET Aspire、Blazor、Azure OpenAI等先进技术，数据库采用 PostgreSQL，缓存采用 Redis，客户端支持网页版本、iOS 版本和安卓版本，为开发者提供了一个学习和实践的平台。此外，项目还提供了详细的运行和部署指南，以及示例产品数据和AI集成，帮助开发者更好地理解和应用这些技术。</span></p>
<ul>
<li>项目源码地址：<a href="https://github.com/dotnet/eShop" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/dotnet/eShop</a></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509903&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=c99c97360ea24a45270b8e476f9f0327&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ufxiFkdNbW6UaufvlHE2FQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121220747-329831526.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121226062-666222533.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Module Shop<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Module Shop是一个基于.NET Core构建的简单、跨平台、模块化、完全开源免费（<span>MIT License）的商城系统。</span></span></p>
<ul>
<li>项目源码地址：<a href="https://github.com/trueai-org/module-shop" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/trueai-org/module-shop</a></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247507619&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=0cc8eb5cdc4c2a63087f3ffb7eb648cb&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Ga6HUZMNVD117IErVSEgfw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121254002-292380837.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121258716-471552532.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选<span><br></span></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>以上项目都已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</span></p>
<ul>
<li>GitHub开源地址：<a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</a></li>
<li>Gitee开源地址：<a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250302121325376-1503648048.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
